full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN GUR GYI MGON PO LA BSANG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
